Double Door

Chicago IL, 14th April 2006

Setlist

  1. Trains Across the Sea
  2. How to Rent a Room
  3. Random Rules
  4. Slow Education
  5. Dallas
  6. How Can I Love You if You Won't Lie Down
  7. Getting Back Into You
  8. Time Will Break the World
  9. Smith and Jones
  10. Inside the Golden Days of Missing You
  11. Horseleg Swastikas
  12. Animal Shapes
  13. There Is a Place
  14. Punks in the Beerlight

Encore

  1. Somtimes a Pony Gets Depressed
  2. I Loved Them Everyone (T.G. Sheppard cover)
  3. Black and Brown Blues

Review

The show was very, very good. David seemed bouyant and focused–I didn’t notice any of the fumbling or wandering that earlier reviews had noted; he also has apparently memorized his lyrics, as he hardly used his notebook. The band was tight. The only disappointment was the absence of Bobby N.
